SEARCH
Package com.example.plannet

Class FirebaseConnector

java.lang.Object
com.example.plannet.FirebaseConnector
public class FirebaseConnector extends Object
Firebase connector class for interacting with the Firebase Realtime Database.

    • getEventWaitlistEntrants

      public void getEventWaitlistEntrants(String eventID, String status, GetEventWaitlistCallback callback)
      Creates a list of entrant IDs on the waitlist for an event, accessed from firebase.
      Parameters:
      eventID - The String ID of the event to check
      status - The string title of the "status" collection to check (i.e. waitlist_pending" to get all the pending entrants)
      callback - Used for waiting for the asynchronous firebase calls, rather than a return statement.

    • RetrieveUserIDsFromEvent

      public void RetrieveUserIDsFromEvent(String eventID, String waitlist, FirestoreCallback callback)
      method to get all the userIDs in a waitlist
      Parameters:
      eventID -
      waitlist -
      callback -

    • getPicture

      public void getPicture(String type, String id, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<String> onSuccessListener, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnFailureListener onFailureListener)
      Retrieves a picture from firebase image storage with a specified ID.
      Parameters:
      type - "poster" or "profile", to specify if searching for a poster or a profile picture
      id - The ID of the picture in firebase. This is the userID for a profile picture and the eventID for a poster.
      onSuccessListener - Success listener as firebase is asynchronous
      onFailureListener - Failure listener as firebase is asynchronous

    • moveToWaitlist

      public void moveToWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, String oldStatus, String newStatus)
      Copied code from entrantViewEventFragment for moving entrants between waitlists when lottery is run. Also used for moving entrants if they are cancelled by an organizer
      Parameters:
      eventId - Id of the event
      userId - ID of the user
      oldStatus - The original status of the user waitlist (i.e. "pending")
      newStatus - The new status of the user waitlist (i.e. "chosen")

    • updateInviteStatus

      public void updateInviteStatus(String userID, String inviteID, String newStatus, Runnable onSuccess, androidx.core.util.Consumer<Exception> onFailure)
      Updates the status of an invite.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user (document in Firestore).
      inviteID - The ID of the invite to update.
      newStatus - The new status of the invite (e.g., "accepted" or "declined").
      onSuccess - Callback for successful operation.
      onFailure - Callback for failure.
